slider.alt: person riding an ATV on a forest trail
slider.description: Join exciting rafting expeditions on the waterways of the Carpathians. Go through challenging waterways and overcome gusty waves, feel the adrenaline, and enjoy the incredible views of the surrounding mountains.

slider.alt: two people running on a mountain forest trail, one of them holding trekking poles
slider.description: Overcome the peaks of the Carpathians in a unique way - climbing. Make your own way to the heights and find inner peace in the embrace of the mighty rocks.

slider.alt: hot air balloon flies over a lush vineyard
slider.description: Feel Zen over the mountain peaks! Hot air ballooning gives you incredible impressions and panoramas of the Carpathians that seem endless.

slider.alt: two skydivers soaring through the sky, one accompanied by an instructor
slider.description: Fly in the sky over the Carpathians! Experienced instructors will help you realize your dream of free flight. Remember the incredible emotions and panoramas from a bird's eye view forever.

slider.alt: a group of people rafting on an inflatable boat down a turbulent mountain river
slider.description: Join exciting rafting expeditions on the waterways of the Carpathians. Go through challenging waterways and overcome gusty waves, feel the adrenaline, and enjoy the incredible views of the surrounding mountains.
